title: 'Succession' chic: why Shiv Roy and her family are 2019's stealth wealth style icons
text:
It is the show everyone is talking about. But HBO’s Succession - the epic and dark tale about a cut-throat family media empire - is not just getting attention for its dramatic tragi-comic storylines, the stealth-wealth style of the protagonists has become one of the show’s biggest draws, too.

In episode five of the second series, currently showing every Monday on Sky Atlantic, the Roy family (who may or may not be loosely based on the Murdochs) land in a fleet of helicopters at the ‘funny little house’ of fellow billionaires, the Pierces. Their mission is to convince this Kennedy-esque clan to sell their media organisation to the Roys (who already own a Fox News-ish network of their own) and...
description: It is the show everyone is talking about.
